feed.title: Eurostat - Custom RSS Feed
feed.subtitle: This feed has been created based on your search query. For more information, please consult the related help page.

entry.title: HICP - non-energy industrial goods
entry.summary: Harmonised Indices of Consumer Prices (HICP) are designed for international comparisons of consumer price inflation. HICPs are used for the assessment of the inflation convergence criterion as required under Article 121 of the Treaty of Amsterdam and by the ECB for assessing price stability for mone...
